'''''Aiglos Special Issue II. A selection of Tolkien studies in Poland 2006-2011''''' is the second English-language issue of '''''[[Aiglos (journal)|Aiglos]]''''', prepared for the [[The Return of the Ring|Return of the Ring]] conference celebrating the seventy fifth anniversary of the publication of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' by J.R.R.Tolkien.<ref>"Dear Readers" at ''Aiglos''' official page http://aiglos.tolkien.com.pl/english/index.php (accessed 1 September 2016)</ref>

==Contents==

* '''Cover Art'''
** "Frodo's Tale"
*** By: [[Catherine Karina Chmiel|'Kasiopea']]

* '''Articles and essays'''
** "Tolkien and the Vikings. J.R.R. Tolkien's connection with the Victorian literature concerning the North"
*** By: [[Michał Leśniewski|Michał Leśniewski 'M.L']]
** "Samwise the Great"
*** By: Maria Błaszkiewicz
** "Language and myth. Tolkien’s and Barfield’s concepts of 'meaning'"
*** By: [[Karolina Stopa-Olszańska|Karolina Stopa-Olszańska 'Melinir']]
** "Éowyn – the misunderstood Lady of Rohan"
*** By: Justyna Brzezińska 
** "Who are you, and what are you doing in this land? A different way of looking at known things – an epic reading of ''The Lord of the Rings''"
*** By: Maria Błaszkiewicz
** "Noegyth nibin – racism in Beleriand?"
*** By: Magdalena Kudelska 'Geirve' 
** "The Rivendell Hymnal and Tenebrae – Tolkien, Elves and the Roman Liturgy"
*** By: [[Marcin Morawski|Marcin Morawski 'Lómendil']]
** "Three Men in a Boat (To Say Nothing of Huan)"
*** By: [[Catherine Karina Chmiel|'Kasiopea']]
** "''Mythopoeia'' and ''Quenta Silmarillion'' by J.R.R. Tolkien – God, faith, freedom, and the Second Coming"
*** By: Jakub Z. Lichański
** "Nerdanel. A few words about an episode which did not have to be a mere episode"
*** By: Michał Leśniewski 'M.L.' 
** "The First Tolkienists"
*** By: Tadeusz A. Olszański 'Halbarad Dúnadan'
** "Word, power and will – magic in the writings of J.R.R. Tolkien"
*** By: Anna Adamczyk-Śliwińska 'Nifrodel'
** "The Sense of Unity and the Category of Unity. Tolkien's ''The Lord of the Rings'' in the Context of Medieval Epic"
*** By: Agnieszka Kruszyńska
** "''The Volsunga Saga'' as an Inspiration for J.R.R. Tolkien"
*** By: Renata Leśniakiewicz-Drzymała
** "Master of Doom and Ring-bearer: Fate and Free Will in Middle-earth of the First and the Third Ages"
*** By: Tadeusz A. Olszański 'Halbarad Dúnadan'
** "Believe neither editors nor translators, or how I almost rubbed shoulders with a celebrity"
*** By: [[Agnieszka Sylwanowicz|Agnieszka Sylwanowicz 'Evermind HS Took']] 

* '''Fanfiction and poetry'''
** A selection of poems by Anna Adamczyk-Śliwińska 'Nifrodel' in Bożena Mitko 'Nellelórë'’s translation
** English-language poems by [[Marcin Morawski|Marcin Morawski 'Lómendil']]

* '''Reviews and Interviews'''
** Interview with [[Christina Scull]] and [[Wayne G. Hammond]] - from [[Aiglos 6]] (Spring/Summer [[2006]]) (with recent footnotes)
** Interview with [[Tom Shippey]] from [[Aiglos 8]] (Spring/Summer [[2007]]) (with updates)
** Interview with [[Verlyn Flieger]] from [[Aiglos 12]] (Spring/Summer [[2009]]) (with updates)
** Interview with [[Michael D.C. Drout]] from [[Aiglos 12]] (Spring/Summer [[2009]])
** Interview with [[Alex Lewis]] from [[Aiglos 15]] (Winter [[2010]]/[[2011]])
** Review: ''A Fortress Made of Ice: The Silmarillion. Thirty Years On'', ed: Allan Turner
*** By:  Tadeusz A. Olszański 'Halbarad Dúnadan'
** Review: "Destroying the tower built in Beleriand. ''Arda Reconstructed'', i.e. a handful of comments on the book by Douglas Kane, on Tolkienologists and on Christopher Tolkien's edition"
*** By: Michał Leśniewski 'M.L.'
** Review: "A Truly Monumental Work. A Handful of Remarks on ''J. R. R. Tolkien Companion and Guide'' by Christina Scull and Wayne G. Hammond"
*** By: Michał Leśniewski 'M.L.'
** Review: ''A Fairy Tale and Orality in Tolkien's Texts'' (Adrian Jakuboze, Maria E. Pobieżyńska, Michał Żaczek, ''Baśń - oralność - zagadka'')
*** By: [[Karolina Stopa-Olszańska|Karolina Stopa-Olszańska 'Melinir']]
** Review: "''The Lord of the Rings'', the book and the film as seen by the students of the Adam Mickiewicz University"
*** By: Anna Adamczyk-Śliwińska 'Nifrodel'
** Review: "The History of an unusual Friendship? Colin Duriez, ''Tolkien and C.S. Lewis: The Gift of Friendship''"
*** By: Anna Adamczyk-Śliwińska 'Nifrodel'

* '''Illustrations'''
** Barbara Śliwińska 'Vilva'
** [[User:Sirielle|Karolina Węgrzyn 'Sirielle']] 
** [[Catherine Karina Chmiel|'Kasiopea']]
** [[Małgorzata Pudlik|Małgorzata Pudlik 'Marigold']]
** [[Karolina Stopa-Olszańska|Karolina Stopa-Olszańska 'Melinir']]
** Katarzyna Wojdak 'Avari'

==List of ''Aiglos Special Issue II'' editors==

* Editor-in-chief - [[Anna Adamczyk-Śliwińska|Anna Adamczyk-Śliwińska 'Nifrodel']] 
* Articles and essays - [[Michał Leśniewski|Michał Leśniewski 'M.L']]
* Art - [[Catherine Karina Chmiel|'Kasiopea']], [[Karolina Stopa-Olszańska|Karolina Stopa-Olszańska 'Melinir']]
* Proof-reading - Justyna Brzezińska, [[Agnieszka Sylwanowicz|Agnieszka Sylwanowicz 'Evermind HS Took']]
* Typesetting - Tomasz Fruń 'Laisar', [[Karolina Stopa-Olszańska|Karolina Stopa-Olszańska 'Melinir']]<ref>''Aiglos Special Issue II'', August 2012</ref>

Translation into English: Katarzyna Blacharska, Justyna Brzezińska, Arkadiusz Janczyło, Sławomir Kułacz, Alicja Laskowska 'Freawaru', Magdalena Mańko-Kuzaj, Bożena Mitko 'Nellelórë', Joanna Piech and Agnieszka Sylwanowicz 'Evermind HS Took'.<ref>''Aiglos Special Issue II'' at ''Aiglos''' official page http://aiglos.tolkien.com.pl/english/special2.php (accessed 1 September 2016)</ref><ref>''Zawartość numeru SI 2'' at ''Aiglos''' official page http://aiglos.tolkien.com.pl/numer-si2.php (accessed 1 September 2016)</ref>
